StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBALocSearch]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@LocSearch varchar(50)) AS
SELECT v.rs_org_id, v.reg_name, v.dist_name, v.rs_name as rs, rs.mcc_code as rs_mcc, rs.NAME as rs_name, rs.CITY as rs_city, rs.ISOPEN as rs_isopen, v.rss_org_id, rss_name as rss, rss.mcc_code as rss_mcc, rss.NAME as rss_name, rss.CITY as rss_city, rss.STATE_CODE as rss_state, rss.ISOPEN as rss_isopen, v.reg_name + ' | ' + v.dist_name + ' | ' + v.rs_name + ' | ' + rss_name as Summary
FROM MCRISS.dbo.MCORG_VIEW v (NOLOCK) join recrui.ng_organiza.on rss (NOLOCK) on v.rss_org_id = rss.organiza.on_id join recrui.ng_organiza.on rs (NOLOCK) on v.rs_org_id = rs.organiza.on_id where rss.CITY like '%' + @LocSearch + '%' OR rss_name like '%' + @LocSearch + '%' OR rss.name like '%' + @LocSearch + '%' OR rs_name like '%' + @LocSearch + '%' OR rs.name like '%' + @LocSearch + '%' OR rs.CITY like '%' + @LocSearch + '%' OR CAST(v.rss_org_id AS VARCHAR(10)) = @LocSearch OR CAST(v.rs_org_id AS VARCHAR(10)) = @LocSearch GROUP BY v.rs_org_id, v.rss_org_id, v.reg_name, v.dist_name, v.rs_name, rs.CITY, rss_name, rss.CITY, rss.STATE_CODE, rss.name, rs.name, rs.ISOPEN, rss.ISOPEN, rs.mcc_code, rss.mcc_code order by v.rs_name, v.rss_name
